"bracing4": material fueltankMat add -4.93, ADY, 0.902 rotx 90 PRISM_ 6, 0.12, 0.70, 0, 15, 0.75, 0.05, 15, 0.75, 0.098, 15, -0.75-ADX1, 0.098, 15, -0.75-ADX1, 0.05, 15, -0.70-ADX1, 0, 15 del 2 return
"rearBumper": add -8.68, ADY, 1.00 rotx 90 PRISM_ 6, 0.08, 0, 0, 15, 0.30, 0, 15, 0.30, -0.05, 15, 0.05, -0.25, 15, 0.05, -0.27, 15, 0, -0.27, 15 del 2 return
"load": add -8.77, -1.21, LZ MESH 6.14, 2.42, 6, 5, 1+4, 0.08, 0.10, 0.15, 0.10, 0.10, 0.05, 0.10, 0.35, 0.45, 0.30, 0.30, 0.10, 0.10, 0.45, 0.72, 0.69, 0.42, 0.10, 0.10, 0.35, 0.45, 0.35, 0.30, 0.10, 0.08, 0.10, 0.20, 0.10, 0.10, 0.05 del 1 return
Symbol.Script_1D:
DIM supStructure [5] supStructure [1] = `Нет` supStructure [2] = `Нижняя Платформа` supStructure [3] = `Верхняя Платформа` supStructure [4] = `Корпус` supStructure [5] = `Цистерна`
if stlyeSupStructure_m < 4 then ! not tank if bSpoiler then truckHeight = 3.4 + spoilerHeight else if stlyeSupStructure_m = 3 then truckHeight = 3.8 else truckHeight = 3.4 endif endif else if spoilerHeight > 0.75 and bSpoiler then truckHeight = 3.4 + spoilerHeight else truckheight = 4.125 endif endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
if gs_cont_pen=0 then Parameters gs_cont_pen=4 if gs_fill_pen=0 then Parameters gs_fill_pen=91
values "A" range (0, ) values "B" range (0, )
values "gs_rot" RANGE [-45,45] values "gs_rot_hor" range[-30,30] values "nWheel" 4, 6
values "spoilerHeight" range [0.4, 1.4] values "truckHeight" range [3.4, 4.8] values "wheelAngle" range [-30, 30] values "gs_resol" range [12, )
values "stlyeSupStructure" supStructure values "stlyeSupStructure_m" 0, 1, 2, 3, 4
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "stlyeSupStructure" then for iStyle = 1 to 5 if stlyeSupStructure = supStructure[iStyle ] then stlyeSupStructure_m = iStyle - 1 endif next iStyle parameters stlyeSupStructure_m = stlyeSupStructure_m else stlyeSupStructure = supStructure[stlyeSupStructure_m+1] parameters stlyeSupStructure = stlyeSupStructure endif
values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Простой`,`Детальный`,`Откл.` values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 0, 1, 2
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" or gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then if gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 else if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 else gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 endif endif parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m else if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` else if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` else gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` endif endif parameters gs_detlevel_3D= gs_detlevel_3D endif
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then hideparameter "gs_resol" lock "gs_resol" endif if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then hideparameter "gs_resol", "gs_shadow" lock "gs_resol", "gs_shadow" endif
if stlyeSupStructure_m = 3 or stlyeSupStructure_m = 4 or stlyeSupStructure_m = 0 then lock "bLoad" hideparameter "bLoad" endif
if not(bSpoiler) then lock "spoilerHeight" hideparameter "spoilerHeight" endif
parameters ZZYZX= truckHeight lock "ZZYZX"
Symbol.Comment: Грузовик с изменяемой суперконструкцией и дополнительными спойлером вверху и боковой панелью.
